author: gstein
msg: Mark a test as XFail during some transition of the commit process. Another
test has some seriously undefined behavior during revert, which needs a
definition and the appropriate coding correction.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/revert_tests.py:
(status_of_missing_dir_after_revert_replaced_with_history_dir): turn
this into a Wimp test because we're not sure what/how behavior to test
for. add some commentary.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svnlook_tests.py:
(delete_file_in_moved_dir): add a lot of commentary. Skip() this test.

author: gstein
msg: Use the new skel utility functions to simplify construction.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/workqueue.c:
(svn_wc__wq_add_revert, svn_wc__wq_prepare_revert_files): use the new
skel functions to simplify the work item construction.

author: gstein
msg: Add a couple skel utility functions to help with building them.
* subversion/include/private/svn_skel.h:
* subversion/include/private/svn_skel.c:
(svn_skel__prepend_int, svn_skel__prepend_str): new. see docstrings.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c
(entries_write_new_cb): Don't create unnecessary actual tables, but
do enable creating locks from entries. Also tweak some comments.

author: gstein
msg: Fix an uninitialized dav_cache, and reformat declarations to a more
standard form.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(write_one_entry_cb): if we get an error when fetching the dav_cache,
then make sure it is set to NULL. reformatted declarations, and
collapsed a call to svn_error_compose_create()
